attributes.action: Ban variable rate residential home  mortages; Create a new category of Lending institutions authorised to do this business.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lenders borrow long term at low rates and then ride the hikes in interest rates to increase profits,  at no additional cost to themselves, a practise which creats  GREAT DISTRESSs to existing homeowners and their families.
This is not clever business it is sheer robbery. 
Housing finance is not rockert science it should be regulated to EXCLUDE profiterring. A ring fenced financing model should be created and strictly enforced.
